--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> "Right boss" he said over the comlink "why do I gotta get stuck 
with 
> all the slaggen work" he complained as he headed to the storage 
> bay "Well at least someone made a new door, only problem is they 
> forgot to put the door itself up" He commented looking at the hole 
> through the wall.  He begun to set them up one at a time.
>

> >

them
